page.title: 19CARDROSS _ TRANSPORT
page.content: CONCESSIONARY PASSES FOR BUS AND TRAIN ALLOW SENIOR CITIZENS LOCAL TRAVEL FOR 12 PENCE. {BUSES -}THESE RUN TWICE-HOURLY BETWEEN HELENSBURGH AND GLASGOW. THE BUSES PASS IN THE VILLAGE. ON SUNDAYS THE SERVICE IS HOURLY. A SINGLE FARE TO HELENSBURGH COSTS 60P. {TRAINS -}THESE RUN HALF-HOURLY BETWEEN GLASGOW AND HELENSBURGH. THERE ARE EXTRA TRAINS AT PEAK TRAVELLING TIMES WHICH OFFER A SNACK BAR FACILITY. THERE ARE VARIOUS RAIL CARDS AVAILABLE BUT A RETURN FARE TO HELENSBURGH COSTS Â£1.30. {WEST HIGHLAND RAILWAY -}THIS RUNS ON THE SAME LINE BUT BRANCHES AT CRAIGEN- DORAN AND FOLLOWS A FAMOUS SCENIC ROUTE TO FORT WILLIAM. {CARS -}THIS IS THE MAIN FORM OF TRANS- PORT, MANY FAMILIES OWNING 2 CARS. PETROL COSTS Â£1.95 PER GALLON.
